newsitem.title: USA: FHLMC sets $375 million of REMIC securities.
newsitem.headline: FHLMC sets $375 million of REMIC securities.

text.p: The Federal Home Loan Mortgage Corp (Freddie Mac or FHLMC) said it issued $375 million of Real Estate Mortgage Investment Conduit (REMIC) securities.

REMIC 1891, underwritten by Morgan Stanley Group Inc, has a coupon of 8.0 percent and is backed by $125 million of 30-year single-family fixed-rate mortgages, FHLMC said. The issue priced on August 27 and has a settlement date of September 27, the agency said.

REMIC 1892, underwritten by PaineWebber Group Inc, has a coupon of 8.0 percent and is backed by $150 million of single-family fixed-rate mortgages, according to Freddie Mac. The issue priced on August 27 and has a settlement date of September 27, FHLMC said.

REMIC 1893, underwritten by DLJ Securities Inc, has a coupon of 8.0 percent and is backed by $100 million of 30-year single-family fixed-rate mortgages, Freddie Mac said. It priced September 3 and has a settlement date of September 30, the agency said.
